title: Listen! Hear!
brief_description: Introduces the concept of vibration and shows how sound waves are produced and can be measured. An animated sequence illustrates the structures of the three parts of the ear and how sound waves are received and translated.
description: Introduces the concept of vibration and shows how sound waves are produced and can be measured. An animated sequence illustrates the structures of the three parts of the ear and how sound waves are received and translated.
